about_the_game:
Train your aim with Catboy feet and dominate the competition!

Increase your score and share with your friends to prove you're the best shooter!

Earn Achievements to unlock the ability to view the art in the gallery!

Features


  • 3 Maps to choose from
  • 17 Unique Catboy feet images
  • 7+ Different Weapons to use
  • Score tracker
  • Accuracy tracker
  • Firing Range level
  • Close quarters level
  • Sniper level

content_descriptors.notes:
-Not suitable for all ages
-Not suitable for viewing at work
-All characters in the game are over 21 years old.
-Contains full depictions of anime male genitalia
-Contains firing of guns/display of weapons for shooting targets of the images of anime males

detailed_description:
Train your aim with Catboy feet and dominate the competition!

Increase your score and share with your friends to prove you're the best shooter!

Earn Achievements to unlock the ability to view the art in the gallery!

Features

  • 17 Unique Catboy feet images
  • 7+ Different Weapons to use

short_description: Train your aim with a beautiful selection of Catboy feet! Shoot the Catboys with various weapons, and have a fun time while practicing!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Portugal*
*languages with full audio support
